## Welcome {.unnumbered}
Welcome to My Personal Study Notes on Statistics!
This webpage serves as a comprehensive repository for reviewing and updating the statistical knowledge I have acquired through my academic classes and research projects. Here, I aim to organize, refine, and expand on concepts that have been pivotal in my work as a researcher and student.
